issue.body: This way we can exclude specific tests only on GH Action

body:
In another GHACtions run (https://github.com/akka/akka/pull/30449/checks?check_run_id=3252611503#step:6:20256) a different test in HubSpec failed:

(yet another case of a different test on an already reported flaky suite)

```

[info] - must complete after draining control is invoked and all connected producers complete *** FAILED *** (2 seconds, 22 milliseconds)
[info]   java.lang.AssertionError: assertion failed: expected class akka.stream.testkit.TestSubscriber$OnNext, found class akka.stream.testkit.TestSubscriber$OnComplete$ (OnComplete)
[info]   at scala.Predef$.assert(Predef.scala:279)
[info]   at akka.testkit.TestKitBase.expectMsgClass_internal(TestKit.scala:572)
[info]   at akka.testkit.TestKitBase.expectMsgType(TestKit.scala:543)
[info]   at akka.testkit.TestKitBase.expectMsgType$(TestKit.scala:542)
[info]   at akka.testkit.TestKit.expectMsgType(TestKit.scala:973)
[info]   at akka.stream.testkit.TestSubscriber$ManualProbe.expectNextN(StreamTestKit.scala:438)
[info]   at akka.stream.scaladsl.HubSpec.$anonfun$new$29(HubSpec.scala:198)
[info]   at akka.stream.testkit.scaladsl.StreamTestKit$.assertAllStagesStopped(StreamTestKit.scala:32)
[info]   at akka.stream.scaladsl.HubSpec.$anonfun$new$28(HubSpec.scala:188)
[info]   at org.scalatest.OutcomeOf.outcomeOf(OutcomeOf.scala:85)
[info]   at org.scalatest.OutcomeOf.outcomeOf$(OutcomeOf.scala:83)
[info]   at org.scalatest.OutcomeOf$.outcomeOf(OutcomeOf.scala:104)
[info]   at org.scalatest.Transformer.apply(Transformer.scala:22)
[info]   at org.scalatest.Transformer.apply(Transformer.scala:20)
[info]   at org.scalatest.wordspec.AnyWordSpecLike$$anon$3.apply(AnyWordSpecLike.scala:1076)
[info]   at org.scalatest.TestSuite.withFixture(TestSuite.scala:196)
```

> In another GHACtions run (https://github.com/akka/akka/pull/30449/checks?check_run_id=3252611503#step:6:20256) a different test in HubSpec failed:

That indeed looks very similar, and likely the same fix has to be applied to that test.
